Trigger.name: assist
Trigger.script:
PrimerSpellCast = false
if AssistSpells == nil then AssistSpells = {} end
if PrimerSpell == nil then PrimerSpell = "" end
if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
create_tfe_database()
local mydb = db:get_database("skills") local mysql = "select * from abilities where ability like '" .. tostring(matches[3]) .. "%' and level > 0 and character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.abilities, mysql)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell == "" then PrimerSpell = row.ability send("assist -a " .. row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. row.ability) else table.insert(AssistSpells, row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end end else send("gstatus I don't know the ability: " .. matches[3]) end end

Trigger.name: assist clear
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
AssistSpells = {} PrimerSpell = "" PrimerSpellCast = false send("assist -a none") send("gstatus Assisting spells cleared.") end

Trigger.name: begin casting queued spells
Trigger.script:
if (matches[2] == PrimerSpell and not PrimerSpellCast and table.maxn(AssistSpells) > 0) then for keyValue, itemValue in pairs(AssistSpells) do send("cast " .. itemValue) end PrimerSpellCast = true end
if matches[2] == PrimerSpell and continuouscasting then send("cast " .. PrimerSpell) end

Trigger.name: auto assist
Trigger.script: if (matches[2] == "none") then PrimerSpell = "" else PrimerSpell = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your auto.assist skill is currently set to: (.*)$

Trigger.name: assist tank following
Trigger.script: if matches[3] == Tank then send ("assist " .. Tank) end

Trigger.name: reset primer cast variable
Trigger.script: PrimerSpellCast = false

Trigger.name: assist tank rescuing
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == Tank then send("cast " .. PrimerSpell) --Send the Primer Spell for keyValue, itemValue in pairs(AssistSpells) do send("cast " .. itemValue) --Send the rest of the queued Spells end end

Trigger.name: report assisting spells
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell == "" then send("gstatus Assisting with: none") elseif table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell ~= "" then send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell) else send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end
end

Trigger.name: continuous casting
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if string.lower(matches[4]) == "on" or string.lower(matches[4]) == "off" then if string.lower(matches[4]) == "on" then continuouscasting = true send("gstatus Continuous casting has been enabled.") elseif string.lower(matches[4]) == "off" then continuouscasting = false send("gstatus Continuous casting has been disabled.") end else send("gstatus Please use 'on' or 'off' for continous casting.") end
end

Trigger.name: assist fire
Trigger.script:
AssistSpells = {} PrimerSpell = "" PrimerSpellCast = false send("assist -a none")
create_tfe_database()
local mydb = db:get_database("skills") local mysql = "select * " .. "from abilities " .. "where ability in ('burning hands', 'fireball', 'flame strike', 'conflagration') ".. "and level > 0 " .. "and character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' " .. "order by case when ability = 'burning hands' then 1" .. " when ability = 'fireball' then 2" .. " when ability = 'flame strike' then 3" .. " when ability = 'conflagration' then 4 end DESC " .. "limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.abilities, mysql)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 and PrimerSpell == "" then PrimerSpell = row.ability send("assist -a " .. row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. row.ability) send("remove weapon & wear rod.planar.fire") else table.insert(AssistSpells, row.ability) send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end end else send("gstatus I don't know the ability: " .. matches[3]) end

Trigger.name: pointers
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[4]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[4]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[4]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower("on") then enableTrigger("PointAndMists") send("gstatus Point in a direction, and I will go that way and cast mists of sleep once. This only works off the tank.") send("gstatus Please ensure that continuous casting is off. <" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " cc off>") elseif string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower("off") then disableTrigger("PointAndMists") send("gstatus Pointers disabled.") else send("gstatus Only 'on' or 'off' are acceptable options.") end end

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
myName = string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) myNameShort = string.sub(myName,1,4)
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and (string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" or string.lower(matches[7]) == "status") then if table.maxn(AssistSpells) == 0 then send("gstatus Assisting with: " ..PrimerSpell) else
send("gstatus Assisting with: " .. PrimerSpell .. " > " .. table.concat( AssistSpells, " > ")) end
send("gstatus - '" .. myNameShort .. " assist <spell name>' to add a spell to the queue.") send("gstatus - '" .. myNameShort .. " clear' to remove all queued spells.") if continuouscasting then send("gstatus Continuous Casting: enabled '" .. myNameShort .. " cc off'") else send("gstatus Continuous Casting: disabled '" .. myNameShort .. " cc on'") end --send("gstatus gtell '" .. myNameShort .. " cc <on or off>' for continuous casting the first spell in the queue.") --send("gstatus gtell '" .. myNameShort .. " gate <stone>'.") send("gstatus Commands to run if I die:") send("gstatus - '" .. myNameShort .. " deathleech' will begin the process of me releeching all my spells.") send("gstatus - '" .. myNameShort .. " deathleech <spell>' to add or remove a spell my list to releech.") send("gstatus - '" .. myNameShort .. " deathleechlist' for me to list all the spells I releech.") --send("gstatus gtell '" .. myNameShort .. " guards' for me to fear and flame strike the temple guards.") --send("gstatus gtell '" .. myNameShort .. " pointers <on|off>' for you to point in a direction and me to move there and cast mists of sleep.") --send("gstatus gtell '" .. myNameShort .. " bearsgtell <on|off>' for you to Gtell a direction and me to move there and cast sleep on those poor bears.") send("gstatus '" .. myNameShort .. " leeches' to have me list all supported leeches.") send("gstatus 'finon' or 'finoff' to have me wear my waterbreathing gear and fins.") send("gstatus '" .. myNameShort .. " list' - will display my reagent supply.") send("gstatus 'known <ability>' - to see if I know an ability or see what level it is.") send("gstatus 'reportpos' to find my location.") send("gstatus 'reportsco' to have me display my score.") --send("gstatus gtell or tell me 'teleport <location name>' to to have me prep and cast teleport - if bears, please change my assist to sleep.") --send("cstatus Here is list of teleport locations: bears, titans, wastes. (let me know if you want more added)") --if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then -- send("cstatus My retrieve reagents command is 'get2' and 'put2' is my stash command. For example, tell me do put2 all.wire or gtell " .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " put2 all.wire") --else -- send("cstatus My retrieve reagents command is 'get3' and 'put3' is my stash command. For example, tell me do put3 all.wire or gtell " .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " put3 all.wire") --end --send("cstatus My sleep bears bot is gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " bearsleep' - for me to lead and level you through bears.") --send("cstatus My sleep giant pandas bot is gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " pandasleep' - for me to lead and level you through bears.") --send("cstatus My sleep stone giants bot is gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " stonersleep' - for me to lead and level you through stone giants.") --send("cstatus My sleep yetis bot is gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " yetisleep' - for me to lead and level you through stone giants.") --send("cstatus My sleep garden bot is gtell '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) .. " gardensleep' - for me to lead and level you through stone giants.") --send("cstatus tell me 'ee <target>' for me to Eagle Eye and report back what I see.") if tonumber(MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepTo"]) > 0 then send("gstatus PrepTo set to: "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepTo"]..".") send("gstatus PrepSpell set to: "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"]..". Aliases updated too.") else send("gstatus Prep casting disabled. '" .. myNameShort .. " prepto <number>' or '" .. myNameShort .. " prepwith <spell name>'") end end

Trigger.name: astral gate
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again.
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if table.contains(gatelocations, string.lower(matches[4])) then local oldmatches = matches[4]
expandAlias("sta")
if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("put2 all.crystal.channel") expandAlias("get2 crystal.channel") expandAlias("put2 all.white.chalk") expandAlias("get2 white.chalk") else expandAlias("put3 all.crystal.channel") expandAlias("get3 crystal.channel") expandAlias("put3 all.white.chalk") expandAlias("get3 white.chalk") end
send("cast astral gate " .. oldmatches) else send("gstatus Please give me a valid gate name.") end end

Trigger.name: list reagents
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[2]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[2]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
reportTo = "gstatus" enableTrigger("ListReagents") myReagentList = {} --declare it to be a Lua table
tempTimer( 1, [[expandAlias("load") send ("look in XREG")]] )
tempTimer( 3, [[ send (reportTo .. " Here is my reagent supply:") for k,v in pairs(myReagentList) do send (reportTo .. " " .. v) end disableTrigger("ListReagents") ]] ) end

Trigger.name: Teleport via tell
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatchestwo = matches[2] local oldmatchesthree = matches[3] local teleportlocations = { "bears", "titans", "wastes" }
if Tank == nil then Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name end
if Tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name or oldmatchestwo == Tank then
if table.contains(teleportlocations, string.lower(oldmatchesthree)) then
expandAlias("load")
send ("get vial.liq.ele XREG")
if string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "bears" then send ("get great.winter.plain.disc BAGGY") elseif string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "titans" then send ("get before.the.great.columns.disc BAGGY") elseif string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "wastes" then send ("get black.wastes.disc BAGGY") end
expandAlias("unload")
send("prepare teleport")
if string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "bears" then send ("cast teleport great.winter.plain.disc") elseif string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "titans" then send ("cast teleport before.the.great.columns.disc") elseif string.lower(oldmatchesthree) == "wastes" then send ("cast teleport black.wastes.disc") end
else send("reply Please give me a valid teleport name.") end else send("tell " .. oldmatchestwo .. " I am following " .. Tank .. " at the moment, please check with that person for shields.") send("gstatus [ALERT] " .. oldmatchestwo .. " just requested a teleport to " .. oldmatchesthree .. ".") end

Trigger.name: Teleport via gtell
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatchestwo = matches[2] local oldmatchesfour = matches[4] local teleportlocations = { "bears", "titans"}
if Tank == nil then Tank = gmcp.Char.Score.name end
if Tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name or oldmatchestwo == Tank then
if table.contains(teleportlocations, string.lower(oldmatchesfour)) then
expandAlias("load")
send ("get vial.liq.ele XREG")
if string.lower(oldmatchesfour) == "bears" then send ("get great.winter.plain.disc BAGGY") end
expandAlias("unload")
send("prepare teleport")
if string.lower(oldmatchesfour) == "bears" then send ("cast teleport great.winter.plain.disc") end
else send("gstatus Please give me a valid teleport name.") end else send("tell " .. oldmatchestwo .. " I am following " .. Tank .. " at the moment, please check with that person for shields.") send("gstatus [ALERT] " .. oldmatchestwo .. " just requested a teleport to " .. oldmatchesfour .. ".") end

Trigger.name: yetisleep

Trigger.name: death
Trigger.script:
send("remove golden.ball") send("remove shimmering.ball")
onDeath() enableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells")
--BEGIN Set all leeched spells to not leeched --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
--Set all leeched spells to not leeched db:set(mydb.deathleech.leeched, "no", db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name))
------------------------------------------- --Uncomment to verify results in database-- ------------------------------------------- --local results = db:fetch(mydb.deathleech, {db:eq(mydb.deathleech.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name)}) --display(results)
tempTimer(15, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("cstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("stand") ]])
tempTimer(20, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("cstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("north & east") ]])
tempTimer(25, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("cstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("to death med") ]])
tempTimer(30, [[ send ("gstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("cstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("gstatus Tell me or gtell 'reportpos' to confirm.") ]])
tempTimer(35, [[ send ("gstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") send ("cstatus Please give me back all gear and have me wear everything before issuing the 'gtell " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " deathleech' command.") ]])

Trigger.name: death leech
Trigger.script:
if string.lower(matches[3]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[3]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
send("gstatus Attempting to releech now.") send("cstatus Attempting to releech now.") enableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells")
--Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from deathleech where character = '" .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. "' and leeched = 'no'" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.deathleech, mysql)
--display(results)
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if row.spell == "haste" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 giant.rabbit") else expandAlias("get3 giant.rabbit") end end if row.spell == "hypermetabolism" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 heart") else expandAlias("get3 heart") end end if row.spell == "float" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 feather") else expandAlias("get3 feather") end end if row.spell == "continual light" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 wire") else expandAlias("get3 wire") end end if row.spell == "vitality" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 germander") else expandAlias("get3 germander") end end if row.spell == "ogre strength" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 mandrake") else expandAlias("get3 mandrake") end end if row.spell == "displace" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 prism") else expandAlias("get3 prism") end end if row.spell == "fire shield" then if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 sulfur") else expandAlias("get3 sulfur") end end
send("cast " .. row.spell) end else send("gstatus All spells are releeched already.") send("cstatus All spells are releeched already.") disableTrigger("DeathLeechSpells") end end

Trigger.name: Start
Trigger.script:
--This is repop --removed & cast fireball wild & cast fireball gig & cast fireball huge --easiest ones to slay are : apple, raspberry and maybe the tulip --killcommand = "cast fireball rasp & cast fireball apple & cast fireball pepper & cast fireball yellow & cast fireball giant & cast fireball tulip & cast fireball vine & cast fireball herb & cast fireball mari & bers" killcommand = "cast fireball rasp & cast fireball apple & bers"
send("gstatus count") send("gstatus up") expandAlias("sta")
send("drop all.apple,all.tomato,all.rasp") send("put all.thorn TEMP")
if myVariableTable["BotActive"] then
expandAlias("doScan") tempTimer(1,[=[ if group_to_room_compare_new() then send("group -l " .. myChar) send("opt autoloot 3") send("gstatus [BOT] Starting Enchanted Garden run in "..tostring(myVariableTable["startdelay"]).." seconds.") send("gstatus [BOT] gstatus 'go' if I am stuck/paused OR 'stop' to pause me.")
enableTrigger("In") disableTrigger("Out")
if CureMonitor[myVariableTable["GroupCleric"]] >= myVariableTable["mincures"] then
expandAlias("assistfire") send("gstatus sing") send("gstatus [BOT] Start Delay set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["startdelay"])) tempTimer(myVariableTable["startdelay"], [[ if myVariableTable["BotActive"] then send("queue speed 2n") send(killcommand) end ]])
else send("gstatus [BOT] Cures required to start are at least "..tostring(myVariableTable["mincures"]).." and I have " .. tostring(CureMonitor[myVariableTable["GroupCleric"]]) .. ".") send("gstatus pfull") send("gstatus [BOT] Starting next run in 60 seconds.") if portal_timer then killTimer(portal_timer) end portal_timer = tempTimer(60, [[ send("typo") ]]) end else send("gstatus [WARNING] Missing: " .. table.concat(CharsMissing, ", ")) send("gstatus Checking again in 15 seconds.") tempTimer( 15, [[ expandAlias("continuekilling") ]] ) end ]=])
else send("gstatus [BOT] I've been paused. Please gstatus 'go' to have me resume.") end

Trigger.name: PrepTo
Trigger.script:
oldmatches = string.lower(matches[5]) matchesfour = string.lower(matches[4])
--cecho("\n<orange>oldmatches= "..oldmatches) --cecho("\n<orange>matchesfour= "..matchesfour)
if matchesfour == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(matchesfour,1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(matchesfour,1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if MagePrep == nil then --cecho("\n<orange>Creating MagePrep variable 1") MagePrep = {} end
if MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name] == nil then --cecho("\n<orange>Creating MagePrep variable 2") MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name] = {} end
if tonumber(oldmatches) == 0 then send("prepare clear") send("gstatus all prepared spells cleared.") end
MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepTo"] = oldmatches send("gstatus Mage PrepTo amount set to: "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepTo"]..".") end

Trigger.name: PrepWith
Trigger.script:
oldmatches = string.lower(matches[5]) matchesfour = string.lower(matches[4])
if matchesfour == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(matchesfour,1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(matchesfour,1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
if MagePrepSpells == nil then MagePrepSpells = {} table.save(getMudletHomeDir().."/MagePrepSpells.save", MagePrepSpells) end
MagePrepSpells = { "magic missile", "maelstrom", "meteor swarm", "prismic missile", "aether flux"}
if MagePrep == nil then MagePrep = {} end
if MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name] == nil then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name] = {} end
if table.contains(MagePrepSpells, oldmatches) then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"] = oldmatches SetMageEnergyCost() send("alias *cmm cast "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"]) send("alias *pmm prepare "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"]) send("prepare clear") send("gstatus Mage prep spell now set to: "..MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"]..". Aliases updated too.") else send("gstatus You must enter a valid mage prep spell - (magic missile|maelstrom|prismic missile|meteor swarm|aether flux)") end end

Trigger.name: sleepy sleepy
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Condition: " .. mobcondition) --cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Kill Condition: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"])
target = matches[3]
if target == "mountain bear" then target = "mountain.bear" end if target == "wooly mammoth" then target = "mamm" end
if tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) and target == "mountain.bear" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) elseif tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) and target == "mamm" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) else if gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= 50 then --enough for 2 sleep casts if openerflag then send("tell "..myVariableTable["Opener"].." do "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"].." "..target) openerflag = false else send("tell "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." do "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"].." "..target) end else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough energy to safely continue, resting for 30 seconds, then continuing.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ send("stand") send("queue cast sleep "..target) ]]) end end

Trigger.name: track last direction
Trigger.script: currentdirection = matches[3] if matches[3] == "east" then oppositedirection = "west" end if matches[3] == "west" then oppositedirection = "east" end if matches[3] == "north" then oppositedirection = "south" end if matches[3] == "south" then oppositedirection = "north" end if matches[3] == "up" then oppositedirection = "down" end if matches[3] == "down" then oppositedirection = "up" end

Trigger.name: track mob condition
Trigger.script:
mobhealth = matches[4]
if table.contains(CharsInGroup, string.title(matches[2])) then if mobhealth == "perfect health" then mobcondition = 100 end if mobhealth == "slightly scratched" then mobcondition = 90 end if mobhealth == "few bruises" then mobcondition = 80 end if mobhealth == "some cuts" then mobcondition = 70 end if mobhealth == "several wounds" then mobcondition = 60 end if mobhealth == "badly wounded" then mobcondition = 50 end if mobhealth == "many nasty wounds" then mobcondition = 40 end if mobhealth == "bleeding freely" then mobcondition = 30 end if mobhealth == "covered in blood" then mobcondition = 20 end if mobhealth == "leaking guts" then mobcondition = 10 end if mobhealth == "mostly dead" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "stunned" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "incapacitated" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "mortally wounded" then mobcondition = 0 end cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobcondition) cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobhealth) end

Trigger.name: status

Trigger.name: "go"
Trigger.script:
myVariableTable["BotActive"] = true send("gstatus [BOT] Resuming.") send("gstatus up")
if portal_timer then killTimer(portal_timer) end portal_timer = tempTimer(12, [[ send("typo") ]])

Trigger.name: "stop"

Trigger.name: Return to Repop
Trigger.script: if counter >= 8 then --slept all the bears, skipping second sleep send("gstatus [BOT] Finish sleeping all yetis, skipping second sleep.") send("speed e4sed2su2e2sw3se2s") send("cast sleep 1.yeti") tempTimer(1,[[ disableTrigger("Step 1 - Proactive Sleep") disableTrigger("Out") enableTrigger("In") enableTrigger("Step 2 - Killing") ]]) else --missed sleeping some bears, extra sleep of zone on way out just to be safe send("gstatus [BOT] Finish sleeping of yetis x1. Starting second sleep.") disableTrigger("In") enableTrigger("Out") send("e") send("cast sleep 1.yeti") send("cast sleep 2.yeti") send("cast sleep 3.yeti") end

Trigger.name: Start
Trigger.script: counter = 0 openerflag = true send("assist -a sleep") send("stand") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp >= tonumber(myVariableTable["MageMinHp"]) and gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= tonumber(myVariableTable["MageMinEn"]) then send("gstatus [BOT] Start sleeping of yetis.") if gmcp.Group.minmv > tonumber(myVariableTable["MageMinMoves"]) then expandAlias("check group weapons") expandAlias("gbitch rest") send("gstatus sit") tempTimer(7,[[ if myVariableTable["BotActive"] then send("speed 2nw") send("cast sleep 1.yeti") send("cast sleep 2.yeti") send("cast sleep 3.yeti") end ]]) else send("gstatus [BOT] Insufficient moves to proceed - trying again in 30 seconds.") tempTimer(30, [[ expandAlias("continuekilling") ]]) end else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough hit points or energy, resting for 30 seconds, then trying again.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ expandAlias("continuekilling") ]]) end

Trigger.name: sleepy sleepy
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Condition: " .. mobcondition) --cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Kill Condition: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"])
target = matches[3]
if target == "great snow worm" then target = "great.snow.worm" end --if target == "wooly mammoth" then target = "mamm" end
if tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) and target == "yeti" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) elseif tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) and target == "great.snow.worm" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) else if gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= 50 then --enough for 2 sleep casts if openerflag then send("tell "..myVariableTable["Opener"].." do "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"].." "..target) openerflag = false else send("tell "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." do "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"].." "..target) end else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough energy to safely continue, resting for 30 seconds, then continuing.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ send("stand") send("cast sleep "..target) ]]) end end

Trigger.name: track last direction
Trigger.script: currentdirection = matches[3] if matches[3] == "east" then oppositedirection = "west" end if matches[3] == "west" then oppositedirection = "east" end if matches[3] == "north" then oppositedirection = "south" end if matches[3] == "south" then oppositedirection = "north" end if matches[3] == "up" then oppositedirection = "down" end if matches[3] == "down" then oppositedirection = "up" end

Trigger.name: track mob condition
Trigger.script:
mobhealth = matches[4]
if table.contains(CharsInGroup, string.title(matches[2])) then if mobhealth == "perfect health" then mobcondition = 100 end if mobhealth == "slightly scratched" then mobcondition = 90 end if mobhealth == "few bruises" then mobcondition = 80 end if mobhealth == "some cuts" then mobcondition = 70 end if mobhealth == "several wounds" then mobcondition = 60 end if mobhealth == "badly wounded" then mobcondition = 50 end if mobhealth == "many nasty wounds" then mobcondition = 40 end if mobhealth == "bleeding freely" then mobcondition = 30 end if mobhealth == "covered in blood" then mobcondition = 20 end if mobhealth == "leaking guts" then mobcondition = 10 end if mobhealth == "mostly dead" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "stunned" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "incapacitated" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "mortally wounded" then mobcondition = 0 end cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobcondition) cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobhealth) end

Trigger.name: track mob condition
Trigger.script:
mobhealth = matches[4]
if table.contains(CharsInGroup, string.title(matches[2])) then if mobhealth == "perfect health" then mobcondition = 100 end if mobhealth == "slightly scratched" then mobcondition = 90 end if mobhealth == "few bruises" then mobcondition = 80 end if mobhealth == "some cuts" then mobcondition = 70 end if mobhealth == "several wounds" then mobcondition = 60 end if mobhealth == "badly wounded" then mobcondition = 50 end if mobhealth == "many nasty wounds" then mobcondition = 40 end if mobhealth == "bleeding freely" then mobcondition = 30 end if mobhealth == "covered in blood" then mobcondition = 20 end if mobhealth == "leaking guts" then mobcondition = 10 end if mobhealth == "mostly dead" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "stunned" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "incapacitated" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "mortally wounded" then mobcondition = 0 end cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobcondition) cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobhealth) end

--send("gstatus "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." will kill when the mob health is equal or less than: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"] .. "%.") send("gstatus Don't try and be cleaver and use *sneak*, I need to be able to see you move for the bot to work.") send("gstatus Use 'mob [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker.") send("gstatus mob set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) send("gstatus Use 'mobalt [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker - Eggplant or Pumpkin or Tomato.") send("gstatus mobalt set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) send("gstatus Use 'mageminhp [number]' to change set the minimum amount of hit points the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminhp set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinHp"])) send("gstatus Use 'mageminen [number]' to change set the minimum amount of energy the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminen set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinEn"]))
send("gstatus Use 'opener [name]' to change the first person to hit the mob (once per fight).") send("gstatus Opener set to: "..myVariableTable["Opener"]) send("gstatus Use 'Openercommand [name]' to change the command used by the opener to kill the mob.") send("gstatus openercommand set to: "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'waker [name]' to change the waker.") send("gstatus waker set to: "..myVariableTable["Waker"]) send("gstatus Use 'killcommand [name]' to change the command used by the waker to kill the mob.") send("gstatus killcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'finisher [name]' to change the person finishing off the mob.") send("gstatus Finisher is set to: " .. myVariableTable["Finisher"] .. ".") send("gstatus Use 'finishcommand [name]' to change the command used to finish the mob.") send("gstatus finishcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["FinishCommand"]) send("gstatus Use 'finisherwait [number in seconds]' to change the wait before the finish command is used.") send("gstatus finisherwait set to: "..myVariableTable["FinisherWait"])

A slim, hairy halfling is DEAD!!
A filthy halfling boy is DEAD!!

Trigger.name: track last direction
Trigger.script: currentdirection = matches[3] if matches[3] == "east" then oppositedirection = "west" end if matches[3] == "west" then oppositedirection = "east" end if matches[3] == "north" then oppositedirection = "south" end if matches[3] == "south" then oppositedirection = "north" end if matches[3] == "up" then oppositedirection = "down" end if matches[3] == "down" then oppositedirection = "up" end

Trigger.name: track mob condition
Trigger.script:
mobhealth = matches[4]
if table.contains(CharsInGroup, string.title(matches[2])) then if mobhealth == "perfect health" then mobcondition = 100 end if mobhealth == "slightly scratched" then mobcondition = 90 end if mobhealth == "few bruises" then mobcondition = 80 end if mobhealth == "some cuts" then mobcondition = 70 end if mobhealth == "several wounds" then mobcondition = 60 end if mobhealth == "badly wounded" then mobcondition = 50 end if mobhealth == "many nasty wounds" then mobcondition = 40 end if mobhealth == "bleeding freely" then mobcondition = 30 end if mobhealth == "covered in blood" then mobcondition = 20 end if mobhealth == "leaking guts" then mobcondition = 10 end if mobhealth == "mostly dead" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "stunned" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "incapacitated" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "mortally wounded" then mobcondition = 0 end cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobcondition) cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobhealth) end

Trigger.name: "go"
Trigger.script:
myVariableTable["BotActive"] = true send("gstatus [BOT] Resuming.") send("gstatus up")
if portal_timer then killTimer(portal_timer) end portal_timer = tempTimer(12, [[ send("typo") ]])

Trigger.name: "stop"

Trigger.name: status
Trigger.script:
--send("gstatus "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." will kill when the mob health is equal or less than: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"] .. "%.") send("gstatus Don't try and be cleaver and use *sneak*, I need to be able to see you move for the bot to work.") send("gstatus Use 'mob [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker - BEAR.") send("gstatus mob set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) send("gstatus Use 'mobalt [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker - MAMMOTH.") send("gstatus mobalt set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) send("gstatus Use 'mageminhp [number]' to change set the minimum amount of hit points the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminhp set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinHp"])) send("gstatus Use 'mageminen [number]' to change set the minimum amount of energy the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminen set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinEn"]))
send("gstatus Use 'opener [name]' to change the first person to hit the mob (once per fight).") send("gstatus Opener set to: "..myVariableTable["Opener"]) send("gstatus Use 'Openercommand [name]' to change the command used by the opener to kill the mob.") send("gstatus openercommand set to: "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'waker [name]' to change the waker.") send("gstatus waker set to: "..myVariableTable["Waker"]) send("gstatus Use 'killcommand [name]' to change the command used by the waker to kill the mob.") send("gstatus killcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'finisher [name]' to change the person finishing off the mob.") send("gstatus Finisher is set to: " .. myVariableTable["Finisher"] .. ".") send("gstatus Use 'finishcommand [name]' to change the command used to finish the mob.") send("gstatus finishcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["FinishCommand"]) send("gstatus Use 'finisherwait [number in seconds]' to change the wait before the finish command is used.") send("gstatus finisherwait set to: "..myVariableTable["FinisherWait"])

Trigger.name: sleepy sleepy
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Condition: " .. mobcondition) --cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Kill Condition: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"])
target = matches[3]
if target == "giant panda" then target = "giant.panda" end if target == "pygmy elephant" then target = "pygmy.elephant" end
if tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) --elseif tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) and target == "mamm" then -- send(oppositedirection) -- expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) else if gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= 50 then --enough for 2 sleep casts if openerflag then send("tell "..myVariableTable["Opener"].." do "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"].." "..target) openerflag = false else send("tell "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." do "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"].." "..target) end else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough energy to safely continue, resting for 30 seconds, then continuing.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ send("stand") send("cast sleep "..target) ]]) end end

Trigger.name: Start
Trigger.script:
if counter > 0 then bearskilled = 0 mobcondition = 100 send("assist -a sleep") send("stand") expandAlias("check group weapons") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp >= tonumber(myVariableTable["MageMinHp"]) and gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= tonumber(myVariableTable["MageMinEn"]) then send("gstatus [BOT] Start killing of stone giants.") expandAlias("gbitch stand") tempTimer(12,[[ if myVariableTable["BotActive"] then send("speed enunue") else send("gstatus BOT is inactive.") end ]])
tempTimer(18,[[ if myVariableTable["BotActive"] then send("cast sleep stone.giant") end ]]) else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough hit points or energy, resting for 30 seconds, then trying again.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ expandAlias("continuekilling") ]]) end else --no repop send("gstatus [BOT] No repop, resting for 30 seconds and trying again.") disableTrigger("Step 3 - Restart") disableTrigger("Step 2 - Killing") enableTrigger("Step 1 - Proactive Sleep") enableTrigger("In") disableTrigger("Out") tempTimer(30,[[ expandAlias("continuekilling") ]]) end

Trigger.name: sleepy sleepy
Trigger.script:
--cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Condition: " .. mobcondition) --cecho("\n<yellow:black>Mob Kill Condition: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"])
target = matches[3]
if target == "stone giant" then target = "stone.giant" end if target == "stone giant scout" then target = "stone.giant" end if target == "stone giant cook" then target = "stone.giant.cook" end
if tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) and target == "stone.giant" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) elseif tonumber(mobcondition) <= tonumber(myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) and target == "stone.giant.cook" then send(oppositedirection) expandAlias("gbitch "..currentdirection) else if gmcp.Char.Vitals.en >= 50 then --enough for 2 sleep casts if openerflag then send("tell "..myVariableTable["Opener"].." do "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"].." "..target) openerflag = false else send("tell "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." do "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"].." "..target) end else send("gstatus [BOT] Not enough energy to safely continue, resting for 30 seconds, then continuing.") send("sleep") tempTimer(30,[[ send("stand") send("cast sleep "..target) ]]) end end

Trigger.name: track mob condition
Trigger.script:
mobhealth = matches[4]
if table.contains(CharsInGroup, string.title(matches[2])) then if mobhealth == "perfect health" then mobcondition = 100 end if mobhealth == "slightly scratched" then mobcondition = 90 end if mobhealth == "few bruises" then mobcondition = 80 end if mobhealth == "some cuts" then mobcondition = 70 end if mobhealth == "several wounds" then mobcondition = 60 end if mobhealth == "badly wounded" then mobcondition = 50 end if mobhealth == "many nasty wounds" then mobcondition = 40 end if mobhealth == "bleeding freely" then mobcondition = 30 end if mobhealth == "covered in blood" then mobcondition = 20 end if mobhealth == "leaking guts" then mobcondition = 10 end if mobhealth == "mostly dead" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "stunned" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "incapacitated" then mobcondition = 0 end if mobhealth == "mortally wounded" then mobcondition = 0 end cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobcondition) cecho("\n<yellow:black>"..mobhealth) end

Trigger.name: status
Trigger.script:
--send("gstatus "..myVariableTable["Waker"].." will kill when the mob health is equal or less than: " .. myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"] .. "%.") send("gstatus Don't try and be cleaver and use *sneak*, I need to be able to see you move for the bot to work.") send("gstatus Use 'mob [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker - STONER GIANT or STONE GIANT SCOUNT.") send("gstatus mob set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillCondition"]) send("gstatus Use 'mobalt [number between 0 and 100]' to change the health the waker - STONE GIANT COOK.") send("gstatus mobalt set to: "..myVariableTable["MobKillConditionAlternate"]) send("gstatus Use 'mageminhp [number]' to change set the minimum amount of hit points the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminhp set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinHp"])) send("gstatus Use 'mageminen [number]' to change set the minimum amount of energy the mage needs to start the run.") send("gstatus mageminen set to: "..tostring(myVariableTable["MageMinEn"]))
send("gstatus Use 'opener [name]' to change the first person to hit the mob (once per fight).") send("gstatus Opener set to: "..myVariableTable["Opener"]) send("gstatus Use 'Openercommand [name]' to change the command used by the opener to kill the mob.") send("gstatus openercommand set to: "..myVariableTable["OpenerCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'waker [name]' to change the waker.") send("gstatus waker set to: "..myVariableTable["Waker"]) send("gstatus Use 'killcommand [name]' to change the command used by the waker to kill the mob.") send("gstatus killcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["KillCommand"])
send("gstatus Use 'finisher [name]' to change the person finishing off the mob.") send("gstatus Finisher is set to: " .. myVariableTable["Finisher"] .. ".") send("gstatus Use 'finishcommand [name]' to change the command used to finish the mob.") send("gstatus finishcommand set to: "..myVariableTable["FinishCommand"]) send("gstatus Use 'finisherwait [number in seconds]' to change the wait before the finish command is used.") send("gstatus finisherwait set to: "..myVariableTable["FinisherWait"].." second(s).")

Trigger.name: Fire Shield
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 pinch.sulfur") send ("cast fire shield " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put2 pinch.sulfur") else expandAlias("get3 pinch.sulfur") send ("cast fire shield " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 pinch.sulfur") end

Trigger.name: Astral Gate
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatchestwo = matches[2] local oldmatchesthree = matches[3]
if gmcp.Room.Info.num == 11901 or gmcp.Room.Info.num == 11902 or gmcp.Room.Info.num == 11904 then send("tell "..oldmatchestwo.." Sorry, I am in the Clan StrongHold at the moment, so gating is disabled.") return end
if table.contains(gatelocations, string.lower(oldmatchesthree)) then
send("stand") if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 chalk,channel") send ("cast astral gate " .. oldmatchesthree) expandAlias("put2 all.chalk,all.channel") else expandAlias("get3 chalk,channel") send ("cast astral gate " .. oldmatchesthree) expandAlias("put3 all.chalk,all.channel") end
else send("tell "..oldmatchestwo.." Please give me a valid gate name.") end

Trigger.script: send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Make sure we are both in the same room by telling me 'reportpos' to determine what room I am in.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Make sure we are both intro'd to each other") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'displaceme' for me to leech displace.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'fireme' for me to leech fire shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'iceme' for me to leech ice shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " ** You can have fire or ice shield, but not both. **") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'sparkme' for me to leech ion shield.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'lightme' for me to leech continual light.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'feedme' for me to create food for you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'gate <name>' for me to create an astral gate for you.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Gate Names: Amber is Brembledon, Outback is Brithbarad, Wayward is Chiiron, Knight is Medienne, Cairn is Kha-da, Whisper is Voaleth, Blade is Vaasa, Hollow is Pennan, Corsair is Narak, Fire is Sos-kul, Midnight is Orlumber") if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Akralyte" then send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'igniteme <weapon>' for me to cast ignite weapon.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Tell me 'frostme <weapon>' for me to cast frostweapon.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Please read the spells ignite weapon or frost weapon carefully. Depending on the weapon material type the spell could destroy the weapon forever.") send ("tell " .. matches[2] .. " Make sure you hand me your weapon first. After casting, I will hand it back.") end

Trigger.name: Ignite Weapon
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatchesthree = matches[3] local oldmatchestwo = matches[2]
send("stand") expandAlias("put3 all.flask.oil") expandAlias("get3 flask.oil")
send ("cast ignite weapon " .. oldmatchesthree) send ("give " .. oldmatchesthree .. " " .. oldmatchestwo)

Trigger.name: Frost Weapon
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatchesthree = matches[3] local oldmatchestwo = matches[2]
send("stand") send ("cast frost weapon " .. oldmatchesthree) send ("give " .. oldmatchesthree .. " " .. oldmatchestwo)

Trigger.name: Continual Light
Trigger.script:
--If you want to be using the matches table after calling expandAlias, --you should save it first as local oldmatches = matches before calling --expandAlias, since expandAlias will overwrite it after using it again. local oldmatches = matches[2]
send("stand") if gmcp.Char.Score.name == "Kalem" then expandAlias("get2 twist.wire") send ("cast continual light " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put2 all.twist.wire") else expandAlias("get3 twist.wire") send ("cast continual light " .. oldmatches) expandAlias("put3 all.twist.wire") end
send ("cast create light") send ("give ball.light " .. oldmatches)

Trigger.name: Create Food
Trigger.script: if tank == gmcp.Char.Score.name then tempTimer( 60, [[send("eat food & drop food & cast create food")]] ) end

Trigger.name: cannot be replicated
Trigger.script: send("emote says "..matches[3].." cannot be replicated.")

Alias.name: DisableAllMageBots
Alias.script: disableTrigger("MageSleepBears") disableTrigger("MageSleepPandas") disableTrigger("MageSleepStoners") disableTrigger("MageSleepYetis") disableTrigger("MageSleepGarden") disableTrigger("MageSleepBearsSolo") disableTrigger("MageBots") disableTrigger("AllBots") disableTrigger("StableBots")

Script.name: Mage_ReCast_function
Script.script:
--The objective here, is if you enter combat and run out of energy during combat --but combat takes so long you can cast again after regening, then cast again
function Mage_ReCast_function()
if table.keys(gmcp.Char.Fighting)[1] ~= nil and --combat == true TryToRecast == true then if not PrimerSpellCast and table.maxn(AssistSpells) > 0 then for keyValue, itemValue in pairs(AssistSpells) do send("cast " .. itemValue) end PrimerSpellCast = true end
if matches[2] == PrimerSpell and continuouscasting then send("cast " .. PrimerSpell) end end
end

Script.name: mage
Script.script: function SetMageEnergyCost() if MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"] == "magic missile" then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["MagePrepEnergyCost"] = 15 elseif MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"] == "maelstrom" then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["MagePrepEnergyCost"] = 30 elseif MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"] == "prismic missile" then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["MagePrepEnergyCost"] = 30 elseif MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["PrepWithSpell"] == "meteor swarm" then MagePrep[gmcp.Char.Score.name]["MagePrepEnergyCost"] = 70 end end
